entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 13 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to 13 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
